00047 
00048 struct AppPolicy : Config::Policy {
00049   static void init_options() {
00050     cmdline_desc("Usage: %s [options] <log-dir>\n\n"
00051       "  This program dumps the given log's metadata.\n\nOptions")
00052       .add_options()
00053       ("block-summary", "Display commit log block information only")
00054       ("display-values", "Display values (assumes they're printable)")
00055       ;
00056     cmdline_hidden_desc().add_options()("log-dir", str(), "dfs log dir");
00057     cmdline_positional_desc().add("log-dir", -1);
00058   }
00059   static void init() {
00060     if (!has("log-dir")) {
00061       HT_ERROR_OUT <<"log-dir required\n"<< cmdline_desc() << HT_END;
00062       exit(1);
00063     }
00064   }
00065 };
00066 
00067 typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DfsClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00068 
00069 void display_log(DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client, const String &prefix,
00070     CommitLogReader *log_reader, bool display_values);
00071 void display_log_block_summary(DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client,
00072     const String &prefix, CommitLogReader *log_reader);

00077 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00078   try {
00079     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00080 
00081     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager();
00082 
00083     String log_dir = get_str("log-dir");
00084     String log_host = get("log-host", String());
00085     int timeout = get_i32("dfs-timeout");
00086 
00090     DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client;
00091 
00092     if (log_host.length()) {
00093       int log_port = get_i16("log-port");
00094       InetAddr addr(log_host, log_port);
00095 
00096       dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_manager_ptr, addr, timeout);
00097     }
00098     else {
00099       dfs_client = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_manager_ptr, properties);
00100     }
00101 
00102     if (!dfs_client->wait_for_connection(timeout)) {
00103       HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to DFS Broker, exiting...");
00104       exit(1);
00105     }
00106 
00107     CommitLogReaderPtr log_reader = new CommitLogReader(dfs_client, log_dir);
00108 
00109     if (has("block_summary")) {
00110       printf("LOG %s\n", log_dir.c_str());
00111       display_log_block_summary(dfs_client, "", log_reader.get());
00112     }
00113     else
00114       display_log(dfs_client, "", log_reader.get(), has("display_values"));
00115   }
00116   catch (Exception &e) {
00117     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00118     return 1;
00119   }
00120   return 0;
00121 }

00125 
00126   void
00127   display_log(DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client, const String &prefix,
00128               CommitLogReader *log_reader, bool display_values) {
00129     BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00130     const uint8_t *base;
00131     size_t len;
00132     const uint8_t *ptr, *end;
00133     TableIdentifier table_id;
00134     ByteString bs;
00135     Key key;
00136     String value;
00137     uint32_t blockno=0;
00138 
00139     while (log_reader->next(&base, &len, &header)) {
00140 
00141       HT_ASSERT(header.check_magic(CommitLog::MAGIC_DATA));
00142 
00143       ptr = base;
00144       end = base + len;
00145 
00146       table_id.decode(&ptr, &len);
00147 
00148       while (ptr < end) {
00149 
00150         // extract the key
00151         bs.ptr = ptr;
00152         key.load(bs);
00153         cout << key;
00154         bs.next();
00155 
00156         if (display_values) {
00157           const uint8_t *vptr;
00158           size_t slen = bs.decode_length(&vptr);
00159           cout << " value='" << std::string((char *)vptr, slen) << "'";
00160         }
00161 
00162         //cout << " bno=" << blockno << endl;
00163         cout << endl;
00164 
00165         // skip value
00166         bs.next();
00167         ptr = bs.ptr;
00168 
00169         if (ptr > end)
00170           HT_THROW(Error::REQUEST_TRUNCATED, "Problem decoding value");
00171       }
00172       blockno++;
00173     }
00174   }

00177 
00178   void
00179   display_log_block_summary(DfsBroker::Client *dfs_client, const String &prefix,
00180       CommitLogReader *log_reader) {
00181     CommitLogBlockInfo binfo;
00182     BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00183 
00184     while (log_reader->next_raw_block(&binfo, &header)) {
00185 
00186       HT_ASSERT(header.check_magic(CommitLog::MAGIC_DATA));
00187 
00188       printf("%sDATA frag=\"%s\" rev=%llu start=%09llu end=%09llu ",
00189              prefix.c_str(), binfo.file_fragment, (Llu)header.get_revision(),
00190              (Llu)binfo.start_offset, (Llu)binfo.end_offset);
00191 
00192       if (binfo.error == Error::OK) {
00193         printf("ztype=\"%s\" zlen=%u len=%u\n", BlockCompressionCodec::
00194                get_compressor_name(header.get_compression_type()),
00195                header.get_data_zlength(), header.get_data_length());
00196       }
00197       else
00198         printf("%serror = \"%s\"\n", prefix.c_str(),
00199                Error::get_text(binfo.error));
00200     }
00201   }
00202
